tool_description: An API that provides endpoints for generating and verifying hashes using various cryptographic algorithms like MD5, SHA-256, SHA-512, and Whirlpool.
name: Hashing Algorithms API
title: Hashing Algorithms API

api_list.name: VerifySHA256Hash
api_list.description: Verifies if a given string matches a SHA-256 hash.

api_list.name: ComputeSHA256Hash
api_list.description: Computes the SHA-256 hash for a given input string.

api_list.name: VerifyMD5Hash
api_list.description: Verifies if a given string matches an MD5 hash.

api_list.name: ComputeMD5Hash
api_list.description: Computes the MD5 hash for a given input string
